page.title: 082. EMPLOYMENT INNERLEITHEN
page.content: {Leithen Valley Plastics Innerleithen Large sheets of white plastic are used to make trays for butchers.5 people are employed in this small factory which opened in 1947. In another building ceramic tiles with Scottish emblems are prepared for the U.S.A.All clan crests have to be passed by the Lord Lyon King of Arms before the tiles can be sold. {Tweedside Sawmill}employs 14.Owned by Economic Forestry Group P.L.C.Timber products are sold to the U.K. {Quilt Making}is an expanding business. Fibre filled downies and pillows for children are sold in a shop.Sales reps go to all parts of U.K.and Hong Kong. {Pearce's Mineral Waters:}use water from an Artesian Well(30m deep).The Clapperton family run the 100 year old business.Lemonade etc. are made daily and delivered throughout the district.
